[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”||||” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”]

AMAZING SINGAPORE
2 Nights / 3 Days

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” height=”false” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.9″ custom_padding=”39px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”30px|0px|53px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.0.76″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.9″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

Itinerary

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” height=”false” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]DAY 1: Arrival
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]Arrive to Singapore and transfer with Meet & Greet to the hotel.
Rest of the day at leisure.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]Day 2: City Tour-Sentosa Island
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]After breakfast, proceed for city tour-Merlion, Chinatown, Gemstone Factory & Mustafa Center. After the city tour you may proceed for the Sentosa Island by one-way cable car & enjoy image of Singapore.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Package Title” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Oswald||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” text_font_size=”24px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]Day 3:
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.12″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]After breakfast get ready to check out from hotel.
Transfer to the airport.
End of the services.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.12″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/17iw7yh4u2o.jpg” _builder_version=”3.12″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”More Places” _builder_version=”3.0.76″ custom_padding=”0||36px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” global_module=”117″ locked=”off”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”37px|0px|27px|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.0.69″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” height=”false” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.9″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.7″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.9″]
